channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 November 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 5–6 seats
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 2–3 seats
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 0–1 seats
  • Živi zid (*): 2–3 seats
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 0 seats
  • Pametno (ALDE): 0 seats
  • Amsterdamska koalicija (ALDE): 0–1 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by IPSOS PULS for Nova TV, 1–20 November 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Hrvatska demokratska zajednica (EPP): 33.0–39.0%
  • Socijaldemokratska partija Hrvatske (S&D): 15.8–20.6%
  • Most nezavisnih lista (*): 5.6–8.8%
  • Živi zid (*): 14.8–19.5%
  • Hrvatska narodna stranka–liberalni demokrati (ALDE): 1.3–3.1%
  • Bandić Milan 365–Stranka rada i solidarnosti (*): 2.9–5.4%
  • Pametno (ALDE): 2.1–4.3%
  • Amsterdamska koalicija (ALDE): 4.7–7.6%
